oathauth-desc: Forni supporto de authentication usante contrasignos a uso unic a base de HMAC
disableoathforuser: Disactivar le authentication bifactorial pro le usator
verifyoathforuser: Verificar le stato del authentication bifactorial
oathauth-recoverycodes: Usa isto si tu perde le accesso a tu methodos de authentication bifactorial.
oathauth-recoverycodes-important: Iste passo es importante! Non salta iste passo!
oathauth-recoverycodes-neveragain: Iste codices non essera jammais plus monstrate!
oathauth-recoverycodes-copy-success: Le codices de recuperation ha essite copiate a tu area de transferentia!
oathauth-recoverycodes-create-label: Crear {{PLURAL:$1|un nove codice|nove codices}} de recuperation
oathauth-recoverycodes-too-many-instance: Plure exemplares del codices de recuperation ha essite trovate in le base de datos pro iste usator.
oathauth-recoverycodes-exist: Tu dispone ja de codices de recuperation. Ecce le codices. Per favor copia o discarga los a un loco secur.
oathauth-recoverycodes-regenerate-warnin: Si tu crea {{PLURAL:$1|un nove codice|nove codices}} de recuperation, tu codice{{PLURAL:$1||s}} de recuperation original non functionara plus.
oathauth-failedtovalidateoath: Un error ha occurrite durante le tentativa de validar le codice de tu application de authentication. Per favor tenta lo de novo.
oathauth-validatedoath: Le credentiales bifactorial ha essite validate. Le authentication bifactorial essera applicate desde ora.
oathauth-noscratchforvalidation: Tu non pote usar un codice de recuperation pro confirmar le authentication bifactorial. Le codices de recuperation se usa solmente como reserva pro incidentes. Per favor usa un codice de tu application de authentication bifactorial (p.ex. [https://www.authy.com/ Authy], [https://freeotp.github.io/ FreeOTP], [https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/1066447 Google Authenticator], [https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/security/mobile-authenticator-app Microsoft Authenticator] o [https://1password.com/ 1Password]).
oathauth-disabledoath: Le authentication bifactorial ha essite disactivate.
oathauth-step1: Passo 1: Discarga un application de authentication bifactorial
oathauth-step1-test: Discarga un application de authentication bifactorial. Isto pote esser un application mobile o de scriptorio, como [https://www.authy.com/ Authy], [https://freeotp.github.io/ FreeOTP], [https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/1066447 Google Authenticator], [https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/security/mobile-authenticator-app Microsoft Authenticator] o [https://1password.com/ 1Password].
oathauth-step-friendly-name-text: Si tu adde plus de un app, tu sapera distinguer inter illos.
oathauth-step2-qrcode: Scanna le codice QR usante le application que tu ha discargate in le passo 1 pro le authentication bifactorial.
oathauth-step2alt: Si tu es incapace de scannar le codice QR, insere manualmente le clave secrete e le nomine del conto:
oathauth-step3: Passo 4: Nota le codices de recuperation
oathauth-entertoken: Entra un codice ab tu apparato de authentication pro verificar:
oathauth-enter-recovery-code: Insere tu codice de recuperation pre-generate
oathauth-disable-for-user: Disactivar authentication bifactorial pro un usator
oathauth-verify-for-user: Verificar si un usator ha activate le authentication bifactorial
right-oathauth-disable-for-user: Disactivar authentication bifactorial pro un usator
action-oathauth-disable-for-user: disactivar le authentication bifactorial pro un usator
right-oathauth-verify-user: Verificar si un usator ha activate le authentication bifactorial
action-oathauth-verify-user: verificar si un usator ha activate le authentication bifactorial
right-oathauth-view-log: Acceder al registro de modificationes al authentication bifactorial
action-oathauth-view-log: acceder al registro de modificationes al authentication bifactorial
oathauth-disable-intro: Con grande poter veni grande responsabilitate
oathauth-user-not-does-not-have-oath-ena: Le usator non ha le authentication bifactorial activate, dunque il ha nihil a disactivar
oathauth-auth-token-help: Le contrasigno a uso unic usate como secunde factor pro le authentication bifactorial.
oathauth-auth-token-help-ui: Insere o un codice de tu apparato de authentication.
oathauth-auth-recovery-code-help: Insere le codice que ha essite create quando tu configurava le authentication bifactorial.
oathauth-auth-ui: Scribe un codice de tu application de authentication bifactorial (p.ex. [https://www.authy.com Authy], [https://freeotp.github.io/ FreeOTP], [https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/1066447 Google Authenticator], [https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/security/mobile-authenticator-app Microsoft Authenticator] o [https://1password.com/ 1Password]).
oathauth-auth-switch-module-help: Mitte newModule al nomine del nove modulo pro obtener un nove defia de un altere modulo de authentication bifactorial. Lassar vacue si se responde al defia actual.
oathauth-throttled: Troppo de tentativas de verification! Per favor attende $1.
oathauth-recovery-code-login-failed: Le verification del codice de recuperation ha fallite.
grant-group-authentication: Exequer actiones de authentication pro se e pro alteres
grant-oath: Acceder al information de authentication bifactorial (OATH) pro se e pro alteres
right-oathauth-api-all: Consultar e validar information OATH pro se e pro alteres
oathauth-user-not-found: Nulle conto de usator ha essite trovate con iste nomine
oath-log-header: Iste eventos tracia le modificationes al stato de authentication bifactorial de usatores.
logentry-oath-verify: $1 {{GENDER:$2|verificava}} si $3 habeva activate le authentication bifactorial
log-action-filter-oath: Typo de operation de authentication bifactorial:
log-action-filter-oath-verify: Verificar si le authentication bifactorial es active
log-action-filter-oath-disable-other: Disactivar le authentication bifactorial pro un altere usator
oathauth-recoverycodes-description: Un codice unic o un insimul de codices unic que tu pote usar como secunde factor de authentication, o pro recuperar tu conto si un previe factor ha essite invalidate. Le codices de recuperation se crea automaticamente quando tu activa un altere factor de authentication (p.ex. un app authenticator). Tu pote regenerar, copiar e discargar le codices de recuperation a omne momento, a condition que un altere factor de authentication es active.
oathauth-invalid-data-format: Le fornitor de datos non es valide pro crear un clave pro le methodo de authentication seligite
oathauth-invalid-recovery-code-data-form: Le codice de recuperation non poteva esser create.
oathauth-action-exclusive-to-2fa: Iste action pote solmente esser exequite per usatores con authentication bifactorial activate.
oathauth-ui-general-help: Le '''authentication multifactorial''' ('''MFA''') es un methodo de authentication in que le usator de un computator gania accesso solmente post correctemente presentar duo o plus pecias de evidentia (o factores) a un mechanismo de authentication: cognoscentia (un cosa que le usator, e solmente le usator, sape), possession (un cosa que le usator, e solmente le usator, possede), e essentia (un cosa que le usator, e solmente le usator, es). [https://ia.wikipedia.org/wiki/Authentication_multifactorial Lege plus]
oathauth-totp-description: Le algorithmo de contrasigno a uso unic basate sur tempore (TOTP) es un extension del algorithmo de contrasigno a uso unic basate sur HMAC (HOTP) que genera un contrasigno a uso unic fundante su unicitate sur le data e hora actual.
oathauth-disable-method-warning: Si tu disactiva le methodo de authentication bifactorial $1, tu non plus potera usar iste methodo pro aperir session, e tote le datos associate a iste methodo de authentication essera delite. Si tu ha un altere methodo de authentication active, tu codices de recuperation non essera delite.
oathauth-totp-disable-warning: Tu non plus potera usar le apparato de authentication registrate pro iste conto. Tote le codices de recuperation associate a iste conto essera invalidate, a minus que tu ha un altere factor de authentication active.
notification-header-oathauth-disable: Le authentication bifactorial ha essite disactivate sur {{GENDER:$2|tu conto}}.
notification-header-oathauth-remove-devi: Un apparato de authentication bifactorial ha essite removite de {{GENDER:$2|tu conto}}.
notification-body-oathauth-disable: Si {{GENDER:$2|tu}} non ha facite isto, es possibile que tu conto ha essite compromittite.
notification-body-oathauth-disable-other: Si {{GENDER:$2|tu}} non ha requestate isto, tu deberea contactar un administrator.
notification-body-oathauth-disable-remai: Il ha ancora {{PLURAL:$3|un apparato|$3 apparatos}} additional active sur {{GENDER:$2|tu conto}}.
oathauth-notifications-disable-primary: Controlar tu parametros de authentication bifactorial
notification-header-oathauth-enable: Le authentication bifactorial ha essite activate sur {{GENDER:$2|tu conto}}.
notification-body-oathauth-enable: Si {{GENDER:$2|tu}} non ha facite isto, es possibile que tu conto ha essite compromittite.
oathauth-notifications-enable-primary: Controlar tu parametros de authentication bifactorial
notification-header-oathauth-recoverycod: Tu deberea reinscriber tu conto pro le authentication bifactorial.{{GENDER:$2|}}
notification-body-oathauth-recoverycodes: {{GENDER:$2|Te}} resta $3 codice{{PLURAL:$3||s}} de recuperation. Considera disactivar e reactivar le authentication bifactorial pro generar $4 nove codice{{PLURAL:$4||s}} de recuperation pro uso futur.
oathauth-notifications-recoverycodesleft: Controlar tu parametros de authentication bifactorial
oathauth-verify-disabled: {{GENDER:$1|$1}} non ha activate le authentication bifactorial.
oathauth-prefs-disabledgroups-help: {{GENDER:$2|Tu membrato}} de iste gruppo{{PLURAL:$1||s}} es disactivate usque tu activa le [[Special:Manage Two-factor authentication|authentication bifactorial]].
oathauth-qrcode-alt: Codice QR scannabile que representa le clave secrete.
oathauth-hint: Non ha accesso a tu apparato o application authenticator? Tu pote inserer in iste campo un codice de recuperation (presentate quando tu ha activate le authentication bifactorial).
oathauth-recovery-code-hint: Ha tu perdite tu codice de recuperation? Per favor contacta un [[{{MediaWiki:Grouppage-sysop}}|administrator]].
oathauth-must-be-central: {{GENDER:$1|Tu conto}} debe esser ligate al systema de authentication central pro usar le authentication bifactorial.
oathauth-error-multiple-modules: Pro le momento, le uso de plure methodos de authentication bifactorial non es supportate. Tu pote solmente activar $1 post disactivar $2.
group-oathauth-twofactorauth: Usatores qui pote usar le authentication bifactorial
group-oathauth-twofactorauth-member: usat{{GENDER:$1|or|rice}} qui pote usar le authentication bifactorial
oathauth-password-label: Defini un contrasigno forte pro proteger tu conto.
oathauth-authenticator-placeholder: Adde un passo extra al apertura de session pro adjutar a securisar tu conto.
oathauth-delete-warning: Tu non potera plus usar iste methodo de authentication pro aperir session e tu codices de recuperation non functionara plus.
oathauth-delete-warning-final: Le remotion de iste methodo disactivara completemente le authentication bifactorial.
oathauth-delete-wrong-confirm-message: Mal entrata pro le remotion del clave final. Per favor scribe “{{int:oathauth-authenticator-delete-text}}” pro continuar
